dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X. Chang
Manolis Savva
Maciej Halber
Thomas A. Funkhouser
Matthias Nießner
dcterms:description: The ScanNet dataset contains vertex-level segmented mesh with semantic annotations for 3D scenes, which are used to generate high-quality binaural impulse responses (BIRs) for real environments.
dcterms:title: ScanNet dataset

dcterms:creator: Lukas Aspöck
Michael Vorländer
Fabian Brinkmann
David Ackermann
Stefan Weinzierl
dcterms:description: The BRAS dataset is used to evaluate the contribution of material properties to the accuracy of binaural impulse responses generated using the Listen2Scene method.
dcterms:title: BRAS dataset

dcterms:creator: Christoph Kling
dcterms:description: The absorption coefficient database provides acoustic absorption coefficients for various materials, which are used to assign material properties in the 3D scenes.
dcterms:title: Absorption coefficient database

dcterms:creator: Zhenyu Tang
Rohith Aralikatti
Anton Jeran Ratnarajah
Dinesh Manocha
dcterms:description: The GWA dataset is a large high-quality acoustic dataset used for audio processing, which provides acoustic material properties for sound propagation.
dcterms:title: GWA dataset
